messages.messageBody:
http://uk.groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingpartnerships/

The original founders of PeacefulPartnerships are now co-listowners
with Schuyler of the new and active list Unschoolingpartnerships.
Sandra, Ronnie, Joyce, Alex, and Meredith are moderators.

Chris in IA

messages.subject: Peaceful Partnerships?
messages.msgSnippet: I recently heard that the Peaceful Partnerships groups is no more.  My understanding is that the unschooling partnerships group, started by Sandra Dodd and &
messages.messageBody:
I recently heard that the Peaceful Partnerships groups is no more.  My understanding is that the unschooling partnerships group, started by Sandra Dodd and & Schuyler Waynforth, grew out of Peaceful Partnerships, which then dissolved.  I could be mistaken as I left PP shortly before the Unschooling Partnerships group was formed.  The only person I know in connection with PP is Jane Bertone.  I'll ask her on facebook if PP still exists somewhere, or if UP is the only couples group for unschooling families.

Sylvia
